name: Strawberry Lollipop
description: A tangy strawberry lollipop made with real strawberry juice and magical flavorings for a sweet treat.

name: Milk Chocolate Bar
description: Smooth milk chocolate bar with a creamy, buttery finish and a touch of cocoa beans from Sweetopia.

name: Gummy Bears
description: Chewy gummy bears with wild berry and citrus flavors, topped with a hint of secret syrupy sweetness.

name: Cotton Candy
description: Fluffy cotton candy made from pure whimsy, sugar, and a hint of rainbow that will float you into sweetness.

name: Pastel Marshmellows
description: Soft, pastel-colored marshmallows filled with vanilla sweetness and a touch of magic dust for extra flavor.

name: Chocolate Hearts
description: Velvety milk chocolate hearts sprinkled with love, offering a smooth and indulgent bite.

name: Brownies
description: Fudgy brownies made with premium cocoa and butter, delivering a melt-in-your-mouth experience.

name: Candy Drops
description: Tangy candy drops bursting with fruity goodness and a surprise twist in every bite.

name: Cheesecake
description: Rich and creamy cheesecake topped with a swirl of caramel, offering a decadent and indulgent experience.

name: Vanilla n' Blueberry
description: A perfect blend of sweet vanilla and fresh blueberries, creating a burst of fruity, creamy bliss.

name: Forest Gift
description: Forest-inspired cookies packed with wild berry compote and a mix of forest spices for a magical taste.

name: Honey Cake
description: Delicate honey cake with a touch of cinnamon, delivering a soft and sweet flavor thatâ€™s pure joy.

name: Vanilla
description: Buttery vanilla cake with a rich, smooth flavor, offering a classic yet delightful experience.

name: Chocolate Cake
description: Rich chocolate cake with smooth ganache and dark chocolate chips, creating a deep, indulgent flavor.

name: Cake Pops
description: Bite-sized cake pops dipped in creamy chocolate and sprinkled with colorful toppings for a sweet treat.

name: Nutty Caramel Pie
description: Crunchy nuts and silky caramel blend together in this addictive pie for a sweet and salty delight.

name: Nutty Chocolate Bar
description: Crunchy chocolate bar with roasted nuts and caramel, offering a perfect balance of sweet and salty flavors.

name: White Chocolate Bar
description: Smooth, creamy white chocolate with a hint of vanilla bean, delivering a melt-in-your-mouth sensation.

name: Dark Chocolate Bar
description: Rich, intense dark chocolate with a slightly bitter finish, perfect for true chocolate lovers.

name: Lollipop n' Gummy Bear Mix Bag
description: A mix of lollipops and gummy bears, offering the best of both chewy and crunchy candy in one bag.

name: Coca-Cola Lollipops
description: Coca-Cola flavored lollipops with a refreshing, fizzy taste that brings the essence of soda in candy form.
